summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1959, for the improvement of Eighth Avenue, from Howell Street to Westlake Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by planking and constructing wooden curbs and gutters and wooden sidewalks, under Ordinance No. 20321, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
